thread.title: Sunday Best: Florals and other folderol for spring
thread.title_full: Sunday Best: Florals and other folderol for spring | The Seattle Times

author: Moira Macdonald
title: Sunday Best: Florals and other folderol for spring
text:
Ever since “The Devil Wears Prada,” I haven’t been able to look at a floral print without hearing Miranda Priestly (Meryl Streep) intoning, “Florals? For spring? Groundbreaking .” Nonetheless, this one — from Elie Saab’s show during Paris Haute Couture Week earlier this month — is rather dreamy, particularly when accessorized with whatever that gold tiara-like thing might be. I can hear Miranda now: “Tiaras? For fall? Interesting. ”
Moira Macdonald: 206-464-2725 or mmacdonald@seattletimes.com . On Facebook: facebook.com/heymoira
